name: Animated Twitter Bird
author: Sujith Kumar

sections.description:
This plugin adds an animated flying twitter bird in your blog. If you move the mouse over the bird,
a “tweet this” -and displays a “follow me” button. The bird found itself as the “follow me” link on the Twitter account.
In addition to this a balloon with your latest tweet can be displayed optionally. The original script for this plugin is designed by http://floern.com, released under GNU/GPL.More Details at Plugin Support Page
sections.installation:
1. Upload the AnimatedTwitterBird folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Enter your Twitter Id by clicking the AnimatedTwitterBird under Settings menu
sections.faq: If you have any questions or feature requests please post the same in Plugin Support Page

short_description: Adds an animated flying bird twitter bird with follow and tweet this links.
